Class Pawn

java.lang.Object
chess.ChessPieceImp
chess.Pawn
All Implemented Interfaces:
chess.ChessPiece
public class Pawn extends ChessPieceImp
This class represents the Pawn piece in the chessgame.

    • pawnCanMoveOneUpOrDown

      public void pawnCanMoveOneUpOrDown(Collection<chess.ChessMove> validPawnMoves, chess.ChessBoard board, chess.ChessPosition myPosition, int pawnRowNumber, int rowOffset, int endRow)
      Helper function to get list of moves pawn can make.
      Parameters:
      validPawnMoves - List of ChessMove objects. Valid moves pawn can make.
      board - ChessBoard object. Current game board.
      myPosition - ChessPosition object. Pawn's current position.
      pawnRowNumber - An integer than represents what row the pawn is on.
      rowOffset - An integer that represents whether a pawn will move up or down.
      endRow - An integer that shows the farthest a pawn can travel.

      myPosition - ChessPosition object. Pawn's current position.
      pawnRowNumber - An integer than represents what row the pawn is on.
      rowOffset - An integer that represents whether a pawn will move up or down.
      pawnStartRow - An integer that shows whether the pawn is at its starting row.

    • checkPawnAttackMove

      private void checkPawnAttackMove(Collection<chess.ChessMove> validPawnMoves, chess.ChessBoard board, chess.ChessPosition myPosition, int newRowNum, ChessPositionImp upperDiagPos)
      Helper function to get list of moves pawn can make.
      Parameters:
      validPawnMoves - List of ChessMove objects. Valid moves pawn can make.
      board - ChessBoard object. Current game board.
      myPosition - ChessPosition object. Pawn's current position.
      newRowNum - An integer that represents the new row a pawn will move to.
      upperDiagPos - An integer that represents a position diagonal to a pawn.
